item.title: Region & Language Defaults
item.description:
Language defaults seem to be an interesting mix when it comes to websites. The results that show up for a different search region can also be different based on Google’s docs Search Region

One video streaming site refused to show me subtitles in English without me using a VPN to appear as a US member. My quick search through some posts on reddit and the like show this can be a really inconsistent mess depending on the site.
